verbs.description: annual ghoulardifest kicks off at cuyahoga [ARGM-LOC: county] [V: fairgrounds] the fiendishly fun big chuck lil’ john ghoulardifest opened friday night at the cuyahoga county fairgrounds in middleburg heights hundreds of horror movie fanatics are expected to attend the three day event which runs through sunday cuyahoga county fairgrounds
